title: Latin E sports?
body: is there Latin e sports? i was looking at all the leagues from the e sports site but i didn't see no Latin one. is the game not famous over there or not enough players to make a tournament tab for it. just wondering thought this game was played around the world.

They usually are in economically unstable situations, if the region does bad, then everything else in that region does bad as well including sports, look at how prevalent soccer is and how it dominates their culture, yet the last 3 worlcups were won by european nations.

Players from the latin america servers tend to be bad at the game in general. The more you climb elo on those server the more you will encounter english-speaking people. Not trying to be racist, just stating facts. So to answer your question: No there's no tournaments there because they can't compete with the rest of the world.
